nodes.text: The Mutated Geonosian hive was the main nest of the Mutated Geonosians and their queen on the planet Ossus, during the third galactic war. As the Sith Empire invaded the planet, the Sith Lord Darth Malora unleashed her Mutated Geonosian experiments against the Jedi Colony, but the insectoid species eventually turned rogue and started attacking both Imperials and Galactic Republic forces.
